activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Pacific Biomarkers provides clinical trial testing services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries. During the conduct of its operations, Pacific Biomarkers does not directly collect or process personal data from study participants. Participant information is received via the trial sponsor, investigators, or other contracted laboratories. Clinical trial data received by Pacific Biomarkers is key-coded at the origin by the principal investigator so as to obscure the identity of the study subjects. Pacific Biomarkers does not receive this key. Limited subject demographics may be received with the subject code.
